pullRequest.title: PLANNER-1907 Add daemon to SolverProperties
pullRequest.bodyText:
This allows to set daemon mode through application.properties or system
properties.
Example application.properties:
optaplanner.solver.daemon=true

nodes.bodyText:
Can we make that more descriptive of what daemon means? How about something like:
In daemon mode, non-early termination pauses the solver instead of stopping it, until the next problem fact change arrives. This is often useful for real-time planning.
Defaults to {@code false}.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -27,6 +27,10 @@
      * Defaults to {@link EnvironmentMode#REPRODUCIBLE}.
      */
     private EnvironmentMode environmentMode;
+    /**
+     * Enable daemon mode (disabled by default).
+     */
